paragraphs: If you're reading this, you've finally caught up to me. As I was translating the stone before you, a door opened ahead. I waited for you, but I can't risk the door closing. Just read the inscription on the stone, and you should be able to follow. I think you'll find it easy enough to translate.
May the Stars guide you, Andewen
P.S. Don't worry, these bones aren't mine.
